title: Jun You Yun II
synopsis:
Xie Kanhua was about to be executed in the Shanglin Celestial Palace. When Su Baiyi was rescuing him, the Shanglin Celestial Palace disintegrated, and Su Baiyi was taken away by Su Jian, the Demon Lord who had voluntarily confined himself in the secluded prison for twenty years. Then the Hero Conference of Xuanwei Town is held again, Bai Jile lures Divine Official Xue, the second-best martial artist in the world to participate, plunging the martial arts world into chaos. In order to save the injured Nangong Xi'er, Su Baiyi went to the North Kunlun with Su Jian to pay a visit to Su Suomo, the ancestor of the Su family, while Yuling and Feng Zuojun respectively headed to Qingcheng Mountain and the Demon Town to learn martial arts. Under the latent tension, the Yingzhou Immortal Island reappeared. The invaders from the island issued a provocation to the martial artists, saying that those who submit will prosper, while those who resist will perish...

(Source: Bilibili)
